name: Space Y (Build your space company)
description:
Build your own space company.

Pass all the unique levels.

Make money.

Buy new rockets.

Train your astronauts.

Be the richest of all time.

Made by Gokberk Akar

Rocket Controls

Thrust: Space

Rotate: Arrow Keys

Astronaut Controls

Thrust: Space

Onward: Shift

Rotate: Arrow Keys
